author: YourName
install_msg: Thanks for installing TwitchSchedule! To get started, set your Twitch API credentials using `[p]settwitchcreds` in DM, then configure your schedule using `[p]twitchschedule`.
name: TwitchSchedule
short: Sync Twitch streaming schedule to Discord
description: Automatically syncs your Twitch streaming schedule to a Discord channel
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores channel IDs and Twitch usernames for schedule synchronization. No personal data is stored.
